name: rabeq2i
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: bitri(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0), wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c1, w0)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))

-| wb(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))

-| wb(wcel(cv(s0), crab(s0, c1, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), w0))

comment: Inference from equality of a class variable and a restricted class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-2004.)
